articles.title: Gen Z doesn't care about sports. That's part of a bigger problem.

articles.title: Belarus: The opposition tries to get out of Lukashenko's trap
articles.description: The Belarusian leader is blocking exiled critics from renewing their documents abroad to force their return. Meanwhile, Sviatlana Tsikhanouskaya's alternative government is pushing for EU recognition of their new passports.
articles.content:
In Poland, a Belarusian exile holds a placard calling for "freedom for Belarusian political prisoners", during a demonstration in Warsaw, August 9, 2023. SOPA IMAGES / SIPA

articles.title: Used cars with the worst resale value after 5 years
articles.description: Luxury sports cars, perhaps unsurprisingly, on average lose more than half of their value after five years, according to a new report.
articles.content:
A new Maserati Quattroporte loses more than 63% of its value on average or about $100,000 after five years on the road.
